Key Match Events: The White Sox scored three runs in the bottom of the eighth to rally from a 2-0 deficit and hold on for a 3-2 victory.
Pre-Game Insights: White Sox fans came out to witness history as the team looked to avoid a 121st loss, which would have surpassed the New York Mets' 120 losses in 1962.
Post-Match Reflections: The team avoided setting the record for the worst record in modern baseball history.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was part of a series where the White Sox are trying to avoid a historic number of losses.
